      This method add new product in list
      Parameters:
      name - name of product
      description - description of product
      count - count of product in stock
      price - price of product
      Returns:
      if it is at list of product, it will return false. Otherwise it will return true

      Parameters:
      name - name of product that needs to change count
      count - new count of product
      Returns:
      if product is missing than it will return false, otherwise it will return true
